name: Block Puzzle Wood Puzzle Game
description:
Block Puzzle - Wood Block Puzzle Game is a wooden jigsaw puzzle specially designed for you! The combination of log cubes and natural themes inspired by nature allows you to not only have fun in the game, but also to be closer to nature. It can relax your mind and at the same time make your brain to be fully trained!

Play classic cube games to get jigsaw pieces!
Drag the blocks to make the blocks on the chessboard form a complete row or column to eliminate; The more rows or columns eliminated each time, the higher the score obtained; Eliminate the row or column where the puzzle pieces are located to get the puzzle pieces;

Collect the corresponding number of puzzle pieces to unlock more natural themes; Unlock more themes and create your own beautiful picture library!

Play jigsaw block puzzle for free, puzzle blocks game for everyone! Give it a try, we believe you will love it!
